description:
we can create an instance and a volume successfully on dashboard , but we can't attache the volume to the instance.
it will give follow message if we do this action. whether  there are some problems about out disk?


the error log as follow:
> [13849.341811] scsi21 : iSCSI Initiator over TCP/IP
> [13849.350136]  connection16:0: detected conn error (1020)
title: a created volume can't be attached to an instance
